Class IntegrityVariablesMembers

  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntegrityVariablesParser, IntegrityVariablesParser_JavaTreeParser

    public abstract class IntegrityVariablesMembers
extends AbstractTreeParser
    Class containing pure Java methods for the IntegrityVariables transformation.
    Author:
    David Formanek

      • replaceType

        public boolean replaceType(org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree tree,
                  java.lang.String type)
        Replaces variable type in a declaration of a protected variable according to the template.
        Parameters:

        type - the old type
        Returns:
        true whether the type changed, false otherwise

      • setAssign

        public void setAssign(java.lang.String left,
             java.lang.String right,
             java.lang.String sign,
             IntegrityVariablesMembers.Variable var,
             org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree tree)
        Replaces a short assignment expression like 'left sign= right' where 'left' is the name of a protected variable.
        Parameters:
        left - name of the variable on the left side
        right - expression on the right side of assignment
        sign - the sign of the assignment: '+', '-', '*', '/', '&', '|', '%', '<<<', '<<' or '>>'
        var - the variable from the left side
        tree - whole assignment tree

                    org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree tree)
        Replaces simple assignment expression (only if variable is protected).
        Parameters:
        expression - expression on the right side of the assignment
        var - the variable
        tree - only the right side of the assignment

      • setPreIncDec

        public void setPreIncDec(IntegrityVariablesMembers.Variable var,
                java.lang.String sign,
                org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree tree)
        Replaces preincrementation or predecrementation of a protected variable.
        Parameters:
        var - the variable which is incremented/decremented
        sign - '+' for incrementation, '-' for decrementation
        tree - whole incrementation/decrementation tree

      • setPostIncDec

        Parameters:

        sign - '+' for incrementation, '-' for decrementation
        tree - whole incrementation/decrementation tree

                    org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree tree)
        Adds getter to get the original value of a protected variable.
        Parameters:
        expression - full variable name (primary expression)
        var - the variable
